mapper.insert: insert into tbl_org values (#{orgNo}, #{orgId}, #{orgPw}, #{orgName}, #{orgBiznum}, #{orgPhone}, #{orgEmail}, #{orgAddrMain}, #{orgAddrDetail}, #{orgIntroduce}, #{orgAccount}, #{orgAccountBank}, sysdate, 36.5, 0, null, null)
mapper.select: select org_no as orgNo, org_pw as orgPw, org_name as orgName from tbl_org where org_id = #{orgId}

select org_no as orgNo, org_id as orgId, org_name as orgName, org_biznum as orgBiznum, org_phone as orgPhone, org_email as orgEmail, org_addr_main as orgAddrMain, org_addr_detail as orgAddrDetail, org_introduce as orgIntroduce, org_account as orgAccount, org_account_bank as orgAccountBank, org_temperature as orgTemperature, org_thumb as orgThumbPath, org_url as orgUrl from tbl_org where org_no = #{orgNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_org set org_name = #{orgName}, org_biznum = #{orgBiznum}, org_phone = #{orgPhone}, org_email = #{orgEmail}, org_addr_main = #{orgAddrMain}, org_addr_detail = #{orgAddrDetail}, org_introduce = #{orgIntroduce}, org_account = #{orgAccount}, org_account_bank = #{orgAccountBank}, org_url = #{orgUrl} where org_no = #{orgNo}
mapper.select: SELECT a.alarm_no AS alarmNo, a.member_no AS memberNo, a.biz_no AS bizNo, b.biz_name AS bizName, a.alarm_type AS alarmType, a.alarm_date AS alarmDate, a.alarm_read AS alarmRead FROM tbl_alarm a JOIN tbl_donate_biz b ON a.biz_no = b.biz_no WHERE b.org_no = #{_parameter}
